formulas.name: DeficiencyConcat
formulas.expression: "License Plate Installed?:" + " " + {!LicensePlateReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Boat Numbers Installed?:" + " " + {!BoatNumbersReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "All options on boat as per Invoice (ADDONS)?:" + " " + {!AllOptionsReason} + "" + {!lineBreak} + "Are all serial numbers correct?:" + " " + {!SerialNumberReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Boat Package Appearence acceptable?:" + " " + {!BoatPackageReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Compartments Cleaned?:" + " " + {!CompartmentsCleanedReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Boat Electrical Checked?:" + " " + {!BoatElectricalReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Doors, Windows & Gates Checked?:" + " " + {!DoorsWindowsGatesReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Tire Pressure to Spec?:" + " " + {!TirePressureReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Wheels Torqued?:" + " " + {!WheelTorqueReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Trailer Lights Checked?:" + " " + {!TrailerLightReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Coupler & Pin Functioning?:" + " " + {!CouplerPinReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Tie Downs Installed?:" + " " + {!TieDownsInstalledReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Tie Downs in Boat?:" + " " + {!TieDownsInBoatReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Canvas Fitment Ok?:" + " " + {!CanvasFitmentReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Pontoon Brake Lockout Removed?:" + " " + {!PontoonBrakeReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Checked for Alternate ERPs?:" + " " + {!AlternateERPsReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Blue Drybag in Boat with relevant manuals?:" + " " + {!BlueDrybagReason} + " " + {!lineBreak} + "Water Tested?:" + " " + {!WaterTestedReason}

value.stringValue: All Options on Boat as per Invoice? (ADDONS)

fields.name: DisplayConfirmation

fields.name: ReasonWhySection
fields.fieldText: The following questions have been marked as false. Please provide a reason for each question.
